channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Long Covid's Cruelest Symptom: Homelessness. https://t.co/dcJZDn6AR9
@chipchristian @PhilipGreenspun if you have any further response, please take me off the cc list. thanks.
@PhilipGreenspun It's hard to know. But I don't have to feel something personally to be against it.
A US college is shutting down for good following a ransomware attack. https://t.co/rgHEDE6BBd
The 'five pandemics' driving 1 million U.S. Covid deaths. https://t.co/6PFwnW4tWk

Supreme Court justices would do well to meet the people whose lives they are preparing to ruin. They could make an effort, resign, or put up with protests at their homes. Calling in the military is exactly what royalty would do.
I remember well “meeting” anti-abortion protestors at the DNC in 2008 in Denver. Every day we had to walk a gauntlet of wackos with their bloody pictures, screaming obscenities at us just because we wanted to participate in the political process.
Pantheon Roller Coaster 4K POV Busch Gardens Williamsburg. https://t.co/cayMg8DQ1O
@ElieNYC Knicks fans know all about this.
@xmlguy @ecrosstexas @elonmusk If Twitter Pro supported Markdown that would take care of 2 and 3.
More human remains in Lake Mead found amid water level drop. https://t.co/ig05xiTym4
@ChrisAldrich @rroudt @thunknotes Agree. https://t.co/yYkHcrwOCN
Re the stock market selloffs, where are they putting the proceeds? Inflation makes cash unattractive, right? Are they really that worried the economy is going to crash?
Like everyone else, I'm a big Mattea Roach fan. https://t.co/feEmXiu4GM

It'd be interesting to see the results of a poll: 1. Do you wear a mask to protect against transmission of Covid? 2. Are you in favor of repealing Roe v Wade to force people who are pregnant to go through months of painful, risky and expensive medical procedures?
How George Floyd spent his final hours. https://t.co/EZsP56tDns
A Note About Today’s Wordle Game. https://t.co/Q15x7G6P2m
@RajeshRazdan @elonmusk Excellent.
Newsom would be a formidable presidential candidate. https://t.co/DPsGZiRi2F
@brijwhiz I have no insight into that.
@Robert_A_Wolfe @elonmusk That's correct. I want Twitter to peer with blogging platforms. BTW, I wrote the first blogging software, so you can assume I know what the features are. ;-)
I'm swapping my Tesla Model 3 for a Model Y later this week. I needed the extra room, getting in and out of the sporty Model 3 was too hard on my back. https://t.co/7cotComN9T
@tingilinde @gassee @elonmusk Me too. They could set a precedent for other media, offer the users a way to opt out of the surveillance features. I want to be a customer, not a product.
Pelosi: GOP will "seek to criminalize abortion nationwide." https://t.co/U6yP6W6fq7
